My First Jekyll Post from a non web developer

20 February 2015
My first experiences as a low-level programmer with Jekyll, the github pages hosting and my continuing ruby exploration

It all started as I amassed documentation from a recent project I've been working on for AVR8 chips (called Cavrn) I realized that I had nowhere useful to deliver my html based documentation with. Right as I saw Github pages I knew it was a fit but I couldn't choose the stack immediatley, so after a bit of fussing I landed on Jekyll-bootstrap-matierial by sentenza on github.
